replies.body: Why doesn't his passive proc Aery?
I agree 100% his passive should trigger the aery shield on allies because it's a spell! Albeit, a passive one.

> [{quoted}](name=Akinero,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=EfLEKxVG,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-09-04T09:17:13.809+0000)
>
> I agree 100% his passive should trigger the aery shield on allies because it's a spell! Albeit, a passive one.

I sent in a report and they acknowledged it could be a bug. Not proc-ing when he hits a enemy champion is understandable, but even if he hits a monster or turret it doesn't proc
RIOT PLZ? Nunu & Willumps abilities are still the old ones when you go look into his lore...
Can Riot put a mass disenchantment for champions in the loot
what happened to my previous nunu skins??
Just played my first game with Zombie Nunu.  Smooshing people with a giant boogerball of doom is very epic.  10/10 rework

Taking away ice blast was the stupidest idea. it was so fun to use and looked so cool. now its replace by stupid snowballs. absolute zero is better now and consume is better, but everything else is worse. Almost All of the skins he has are ugly now. I wish I didn't buy any nunu skins because I don't like any now. I used to love demolisher nunu but they ruined it. they ruined all nunu skins that I liked. Nunu is an ugly kid now with an annoying voice and dumb sayings. nunu is no longer one of my favorite champs now.
Can't it last till the twelfth for 2 whole weeks?

So the Champion Name in game is Nunu & Willump. 

Sooo.... what about {{champion:133}} ? 
I Remember originally they had the Champion name, Quinn & Valor, but you removed it because... technical reasons? Obviously you have overcome those... So why haven't you changed it?

Can't wait for him to go off of 100% pick/ban so I can play the duo!

Seriously guys, why are you always banning the new champions even when some were underpowered?
Either because they don't understand the new champion and don't care to learn it or because they don't want allies playing them.

When people pay money for specific skins, you are bordering on frauding that person by changing it (bait and switch), regardless if they like the new skin or not because the old one is no longer available.  Please stop doing this for our sake and so your lawyer doesn't pull his hair out.
